1: אָ֭דָם <sup>120 </sup> <n>Man</n> יְל֣וּד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[that is] born</n> אִשָּׁ֑ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>of a woman</n> קְצַ֥ר <sup>7116 </sup> <n>[is] of few</n> יָ֝מִ֗ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> וּֽשְׂבַֽע־ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>have enough</n> רֹֽגֶז׃ <sup>7267 </sup> <n>of trouble</n>
2: כְּצִ֣יץ <sup>6731 </sup> <n>like a flower</n> יָ֭צָא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>He cometh forth</n> וַיִּמָּ֑ל <sup>5243 </sup> <n>and is cut down</n> וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <sup>1272 </sup> <n>he fleeth</n> כַּ֝צֵּ֗ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>also as a shadow</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יַעֲמֽוֹד׃ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and continueth</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>yet</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n>
3: זֶ֭ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>upon such an one</n> פָּקַ֣חְתָּ <sup>6491 </sup> <n>And dost thou open</n> עֵינֶ֑ךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>thine eyes</n> וְאֹ֘תִ֤י <sup>853 </sup> תָבִ֖יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>and bringest</n> בְמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>me into judgment</n> עִמָּֽךְ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
4: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Who can bring</n> טָ֭הוֹר <sup>2889 </sup> <n>a clean</n> מִטָּמֵ֗א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>defiled</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶחָֽד׃ <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n>
5: אִ֥ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>Seeing</n> חֲרוּצִ֨ים ׀ <sup>2782 </sup> <n>[are] determined</n> יָמָ֗יו <sup>3117 </sup> <n>his days</n> מִֽסְפַּר־ <sup>4557 </sup> <n>the number</n> חֳדָשָׁ֥יו <sup>2320 </sup> <n>of his months</n> אִתָּ֑ךְ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> [חֻקֹּו כ] (חֻקָּ֥יו <sup>2706 </sup> <n>appointed</n> ק) עָ֝שִׂ֗יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[are] with thee thou hast appointed</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>that he cannot pass</n>
6: שְׁעֵ֣ה <sup>8159 </sup> <n>Turn</n> מֵעָלָ֣יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְיֶחְדָּ֑ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>from him that he may rest</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Until</n> יִ֝רְצֶ֗ה <sup>7521 </sup> <n>till he shall accomplish</n> כְּשָׂכִ֥יר <sup>7916 </sup> <n>as an hireling</n> יוֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>his day</n>
7: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> יֵ֥שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>For there is</n> לָעֵ֗ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>of a tree</n> תִּ֫קְוָ֥ה <sup>8615 </sup> <n>hope</n> אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>When</n> יִ֭כָּרֵת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>if it be cut down</n> וְע֣וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> יַחֲלִ֑יף <sup>2498 </sup> <n>that it will sprout again</n> וְ֝יֹֽנַקְתּ֗וֹ <sup>3127 </sup> <n>and that the tender branch</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תֶחְדָּֽל׃ <sup>2308 </sup> <n>thereof will not cease</n>
8: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> יַזְקִ֣ין <sup>2204 </sup> <n>thereof wax old</n> בָּאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> שָׁרְשׁ֑וֹ <sup>8328 </sup> <n>Though the root</n> וּ֝בֶעָפָ֗ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>in the ground</n> יָמ֥וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>thereof die</n> גִּזְעֽוֹ׃ <sup>1503 </sup> <n>and the stock</n>
9: מֵרֵ֣יחַ <sup>7381 </sup> <n>[Yet] through the scent</n> מַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of water</n> יַפְרִ֑חַ <sup>6524 </sup> <n>it will bud</n> וְעָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and bring forth</n> קָצִ֣יר <sup>7105 </sup> <n>boughs</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> נָֽטַע׃ <sup>5194 </sup> <n>like a plant</n>
10: וְגֶ֣בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>But man</n> יָ֭מוּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>dieth</n> וַֽיֶּחֱלָ֑שׁ <sup>2522 </sup> <n>and wasteth away</n> וַיִּגְוַ֖ע <sup>1478 </sup> <n>giveth up the ghost</n> אָדָ֣ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>yea man</n> וְאַיּֽוֹ׃ <sup>346 </sup> <n>where</n>
11: אָֽזְלוּ־ <sup>235 </sup> <n>fail</n> מַ֭יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>[As] the waters</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> יָ֑ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>from the sea</n> וְ֝נָהָ֗ר <sup>5104 </sup> <n>and the flood</n> יֶחֱרַ֥ב <sup>2717 </sup> <n>decayeth</n> וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>and drieth up</n>
12: וְאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>So man</n> שָׁכַ֗ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>lieth down</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָ֫ק֥וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and riseth</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Until</n> בִּלְתִּ֣י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>[be] no more</n> שָׁ֭מַיִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>not till the heavens</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָקִ֑יצוּ <sup>6974 </sup> <n>they shall not awake</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יֵ֝עֹ֗רוּ <sup>5782 </sup> <n>nor be raised out</n> מִשְּׁנָתָֽם׃ <sup>8142 </sup> <n>of their sleep</n>
13: מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>O</n> יִתֵּ֨ן ׀ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>O that</n> בִּשְׁא֬וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>me in the grave</n> תַּצְפִּנֵ֗נִי <sup>6845 </sup> <n>thou wouldest hide</n> תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי <sup>5641 </sup> <n>that thou wouldest keep me secret</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> שׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>be past</n> אַפֶּ֑ךָ <sup>639 </sup> <n>until thy wrath</n> תָּ֤שִׁ֥ית <sup>7896 </sup> <n>that thou wouldest appoint</n> לִ֖י חֹ֣ק <sup>2706 </sup> <n>me a set time</n> וְתִזְכְּרֵֽנִי׃ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>and remember</n>
14: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> יָמ֥וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>die</n> גֶּ֗בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>If a man</n> הֲיִ֫חְיֶ֥ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>shall he live</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[again]? all the days</n> צְבָאִ֣י <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of my appointed time</n> אֲיַחֵ֑ל <sup>3176 </sup> <n>will I wait</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Until</n> בּ֝֗וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> חֲלִיפָתִֽי׃ <sup>2487 </sup> <n>till my change</n>
15: תִּ֭קְרָא <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Thou shalt call</n> וְאָנֹכִ֣י <sup>595 </sup> <n>and I</n> אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and I will answer</n> לְֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>to the work</n> יָדֶ֣יךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hands</n> תִכְסֹֽף׃ <sup>3700 </sup> <n>thee thou wilt have a desire</n>
16: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> עַ֭תָּה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> צְעָדַ֣י <sup>6806 </sup> <n>my steps</n> תִּסְפּ֑וֹר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>For now thou numberest</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>dost thou not watch</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> חַטָּאתִֽי׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>my sin</n>
17: חָתֻ֣ם <sup>2856 </sup> <n>[is] sealed up</n> בִּצְר֣וֹר <sup>6872 </sup> <n>in a bag</n> פִּשְׁעִ֑י <sup>6588 </sup> <n>My transgression</n> וַ֝תִּטְפֹּ֗ל <sup>2950 </sup> <n>and thou sewest up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>up</n> עֲוֹנִֽי׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>mine iniquity</n>
18: וְ֭אוּלָם <sup>199 </sup> <n>And surely</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mountain</n> נוֹפֵ֣ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>falling</n> יִבּ֑וֹל <sup>5034 </sup> <n>cometh to nought</n> וְ֝צ֗וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>and the rock</n> יֶעְתַּ֥ק <sup>6275 </sup> <n>is removed</n> מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>out of his place</n>
19: אֲבָנִ֤ים ׀ <sup>68 </sup> <n>the stones</n> שָׁ֥חֲקוּ <sup>7833 </sup> <n>wear</n> מַ֗יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>The waters</n> תִּשְׁטֹֽף־ <sup>7857 </sup> <n>thou washest away</n> סְפִיחֶ֥יהָ <sup>5599 </sup> <n>the things which grow</n> עֲפַר־ <sup>6083 </sup> <n>[out] of the dust</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְתִקְוַ֖ת <sup>8615 </sup> <n>the hope</n> אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>of man</n> הֶאֱבַֽדְתָּ׃ <sup>6 </sup> <n>and thou destroyest</n>
20: תִּתְקְפֵ֣הוּ <sup>8630 </sup> <n>Thou prevailest</n> לָ֭נֶצַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>for ever</n> וַֽיַּהֲלֹ֑ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>against him and he passeth</n> מְשַׁנֶּ֥ה <sup>8138 </sup> <n>thou changest</n> פָ֝נָ֗יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his countenance</n> וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sendest him away</n>
21: יִכְבְּד֣וּ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>come to honour</n> בָ֭נָיו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>His sons</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יֵדָ֑ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and he knoweth</n> וְ֝יִצְעֲר֗וּ <sup>6819 </sup> <n>[it] not and they are brought low</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָבִ֥ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>but he perceiveth</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
22: אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>but</n> בְּ֭שָׂרוֹ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>But his flesh</n> עָלָ֣יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יִכְאָ֑ב <sup>3510 </sup> <n>upon him shall have pain</n> וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and his soul</n> עָלָ֥יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and he</n> תֶּאֱבָֽל׃ <sup>56 </sup> <n>within him shall mourn</n> פ
